snippet: Acquaintances said that Kevin Ward Jr., who was killed Saturday when he was struck by a car driven by the Nascar star Tony Stewart, had always dreamed of being a racecar driver.
abstract: Friends, family and acquaintances gather in Port Leyden, NY, where race car driver Kevin Ward Jr lived, to mourn and remember him; Ward was killed on dirt racetrack after being struck by Tony Stewart's car.
lead_paragraph: Acquaintances said that Kevin Ward Jr., who was killed Saturday when he was struck by a car driven by the Nascar star Tony Stewart, had always dreamed of being a racecar driver.

headline.seo: Grief in Port Leyden, N.Y., Over Death of Kevin Ward Jr.
headline.main: Mourning a Racer Who Died ‘Living His Dream’
headline.print_headline: Mourning a Racer Who Died ‘Living His Dream’

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
keywords.name: organizations
